topic.fullpath: Topic :: Multimedia :: Sound/Audio :: CD Audio :: CD Ripping

name: CDRX.pl burner script
short_description: CDRX.pl is a perl script designed to handle CD-R/W device setup, CD-R/W blanking, burning, and ISO creation.  It can create ISO's or burn CD-R/W's from another CD, from a directory of files, or even allows you to choose a "mix" of files.
